description: The package manager for Lua modules

script: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { Set-ExecutionPolicy -Scope Process Bypass; Set-Location $dir\luarocks-3.11.1-win32; ./install.bat /LUA $lua /LIB $lua /BIN $lua /P $dir/luarocks /F}"
powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { Set-ExecutionPolicy -Scope Process Bypass; Set-Location $dir\luarocks-3.11.1-win32; ./install.bat /L /P $dir/luarocks /F}"
powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { Set-ExecutionPolicy -Scope Process Bypass; Set-Location $dir\luarocks-$version-win32; ./install.bat /L /P $dir/luarocks /F}"
powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { Set-ExecutionPolicy -Scope Process Bypass; Set-Location $dir\luarocks-$version-win32; ./install.bat /L /P $dir/luarocks /F}"
